description: This header file 'logLevel.h' defines the interface for managing log levels within a component. It provides declarations for retrieving, setting, and automatically adjusting log levels based on property changes. It is part of a larger logging and configuration system in a C-based project.
external_methods: <likely provides definition or declaration related to logPriority>

methods.name: getCustomLogLevel
methods.description: Retrieves the custom log level for a given component name, returning a default value if not set.

methods.name: setCustomLogLevel
methods.description: Sets the log level for the specified component name.

methods.name: autoAdjustCustomLogLevel
methods.description: Configures automatic adjustment of log level based on property change events for a given component name.
